parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Lastly, afterward, later. Neuter of husteros as adverb; more lately, i.e. Eventually.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From meta and the middle voice of melo; to care afterwards, i.e. Regret.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.
